name: RTOS wrapper
short_description:
C++ wrapper for most popular embedded Real Time Operating Systems.
With RTOS wrapper your project will be fully portable to any avaible CPU or targer platform with minimal code changes: it needs only one code string (like #define xxxx).

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: Classic 8-bit Operating Systems (Apple, Atari, Commodore, etc.)
os.fullname: Classic 8-bit Operating Systems (Apple, Atari, Commodore, etc.)

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)
os.fullname: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)
